content: I understand your point but disagree. The flaw in your argument is simple. Warren’s statements were about a nominee, not a Senator. The vetting process requires that Senators be free to criticize nominees, and ones who happen to be Senators should be not afforded protections not given other nominees. https://medium.com/@KeithDB/an-open-letter-to-the-united-states-senate-3ce7bb0eb35e#.sl5y831lz
